keyword: how many calories in a chicken sandwich
title: How Many Calories in a Chicken Sandwich?
meta_description: Discover how many calories in a chicken sandwich, including full nutrition breakdown, protein, carbs, fat, and easy tweaks for variations.
h1: How Many Calories in a Chicken Sandwich?
assumptions: Grilled chicken breast (100g), whole wheat bun, lettuce, tomato, 1 tsp light mayo; no cheese or fries.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by brand, recipe, portion size, and preparation method. Check labels or restaurant info when available.

quick_answer.text: A typical grilled chicken sandwich provides about 350 kcal and 30 g protein.

label_note: Values mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison with packaged or restaurant items.

tweaks.label: Use fried chicken instead of grilled

faqs.q: How many calories in a grilled chicken sandwich?
faqs.a: About 350 kcal for a standard grilled version with veggies and light mayo.

faqs.q: What is the protein in a chicken sandwich?
faqs.a: Typically 30 g from the chicken breast.

faqs.q: Are chicken sandwiches high in sodium?
faqs.a: Yes, around 800 mg due to bun, seasoning, and condiments.

faqs.q: How do fast food chicken sandwiches compare?
faqs.a: Often higher, 500+ kcal if fried or with extra sauces.

faqs.q: Can I make a low-carb chicken sandwich?
faqs.a: Yes, swap bun for lettuce wrap to cut carbs to under 10 g.
